summary:
Enthusiastic people manager and leader. Experienced account delivery lead. Loyal, dedicated, driven and committed. Maintains high standards of values and ethics. Enjoys challenges with enthusiasm and receives change and diversity as a major part of a person’s development both in her professional and personal areas. Great “can do” attitude and taking initiatives in order to successfully deliver and find solutions. Resourceful and effective in identifying challenges or solving problems.

Specialties: account management; delivery management; service management; design thinking; resource management; people management; communication; offshoring; operations delivery; continuous process improvement; collaboration ways of working

PMO lead Unit Management Office Keystone (client Unilever) 

Keystone is the Application Outsourcing deal Accenture has with Unilever in Europe; Latin America, North America and Asia. A combined project from Consulting, Solutions and Services work forces. The overall PMO is responsible for the programme control services for all Unit members which are located in the respective countries of the regions (globally) and the offshore locations: Manila and India. In total approx. 2000+ people.

• Governance of departmental budget

Capability lead Netherlands/Hungary and Engagement activity lead 

Responsible for leading the career counsellor community for Keystone in Hungary and Netherlands
• Liaison with HR on HR issues regarding resources in Netherlands and Hungary

Overall management for all site leads in Keystone locations in Europe, India and Philippines. Main contact on various locations of the Unit on Health and safety; Facilities management; Work Environment; Business Continuity; Security, Risk Assessments; Organisation/communication of local events; Engagement
